h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Past another sealed cell, you can finally find the Lower Pagoda Shrine to rest at, but remember that resting at it will not affect the timer of this area's curse. It's not a bad idea to rest at it after the beguiling chant ends and your maximum health returns to normal, but resting during the curse won't reset your health.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 1)'.
The content is as follows:
Past another sealed cell, you can finally find the Lower Pagoda Shrine to rest at, but remember that resting at it will not affect the timer of this area's curse. It's not a bad idea to rest at it after the beguiling chant ends and your maximum health returns to normal, but resting during the curse won't reset your health.
